df-cref
blocks.content: Define a statement "every open cover has an ` A ` refinement" , where ` A ` is a property for refinements like "finite", "countable", "point finite" or "locally finite". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cref(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccref(c0), crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wbr(cv(s2), cref, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: iscref
blocks.content: The property that every open cover has an ` A ` refinement for the topological space ` J ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscref(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccref(c1), ctop, wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0)))), wi(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0))), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(s0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexeqdv(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), cin(cpw(c0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0)))
  ineq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1, cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-cref(hs0, s0, s1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cref, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c0), c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  raleqbidv(s0, P(hs0), P(c0), hs0 = c0, (â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ s0 â†’ âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), s1[Ref]s0)), (c2 = â‹ƒ s0 â†’ âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s1[Ref]s0)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ s0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), s1[Ref]s0), c2 = â‹ƒ s0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s1[Ref]s0))
  eqeq1d(â‹ƒ hs0, â‹ƒ s0, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(â‹ƒ hs0, c2, â‹ƒ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rexeqdv(s1, (P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), (P(c0)â‹‚ c1), hs0 = c0, s1[Ref]s0)
  ineq1d(P(hs0), c1, P(c0), hs0 = c0)
  pweq(hs0, c0)
  df-cref(hs0, s0, s1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(hs0), c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c0), c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: crefeq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the "every open cover has an A refinement" predicate. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm crefeq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ccref(c0), ccref(c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccref(c0), ccref(c1), crab(hs0, ctop, wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1)))))), crab(hs0, ctop, wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  rabbidv(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1))))), wral(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1))))))
  ralbidv(hs1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1)))), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1))))
  rexeqdv(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0), cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs2), cref, cv(hs1)))
  ineq2(c0, c1, cpw(cv(hs0)))
  df-cref(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  df-cref(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

} = {

  ralbidv(hs1, P(hs0), c0 = c1, (â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ hs1 â†’ âˆƒ(hs2 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c0), hs2[Ref]hs1)), (â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ hs1 â†’ âˆƒ(hs2 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), hs2[Ref]hs1)))
  imbi2d(c0 = c1, â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ hs1, âˆƒ(hs2 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c0), hs2[Ref]hs1), âˆƒ(hs2 âˆˆ(P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), hs2[Ref]hs1))
  rexeqdv(hs2, (P(hs0)â‹‚ c0), (P(hs0)â‹‚ c1), c0 = c1, hs2[Ref]hs1)

  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)

  diff.hs2.c((P(hs0)â‹‚ c1))

blocks.name: creftop
blocks.content: A space where every open cover has an ` A ` refinement is a topological space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: crefi
blocks.content: The property that every open cover has an ` A ` refinement for the topological space ` J ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm crefi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3c(w3a(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)), wcel(c2, cpw(c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0))))), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  sselpwd(c2, c0, ccref(c1), w3a(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2))))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  iscref(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccref(c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  rspcv(hs0, c2, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0)))), wi(wceq(c3, cuni(c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0))), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)))
  eqeq2d(c3, cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  rexbidv(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(s0), cref, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cref)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(c3, cuni(c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm crefi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1)âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c3 = â‹ƒ c2)â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]c2))
  âŠ£ c3 = â‹ƒ c0
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3c((c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1)âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c3 = â‹ƒ c2), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]c2), c2 âˆˆ P(c0), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(c3 = â‹ƒ hs0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]hs0))), c3 = â‹ƒ c2)
  sselpwd(c2, c0, CovHasRef(c1), (c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1)âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c0 âˆ§ c3 = â‹ƒ c2))
  simp1(c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1), c2 âŠ† c0, c3 = â‹ƒ c2)
  simp2(c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1), c2 âŠ† c0, c3 = â‹ƒ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1), c2 âŠ† c0, c3 = â‹ƒ c2, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(c3 = â‹ƒ hs0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]hs0))))
  simprbi(c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c0),(c3 = â‹ƒ hs0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]hs0))), c0 âˆˆ Top)
  iscref(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  simp3(c0 âˆˆ CovHasRef(c1), c2 âŠ† c0, c3 = â‹ƒ c2)
  rspcv(hs0, c2, P(c0), (c3 = â‹ƒ hs0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]hs0)), (c3 = â‹ƒ c2 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]c2)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, c3 = â‹ƒ hs0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]hs0), c3 = â‹ƒ c2, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]c2))
  eqeq2d(c3, â‹ƒ hs0, â‹ƒ c2, hs0 = c2)
  unieq(hs0, c2)
  rexbidv(s0, (P(c0)â‹‚ c1), hs0 = c2, s0[Ref]hs0, s0[Ref]c2)
  breq2(hs0, c2, s0, cref)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c3 = â‹ƒ c2 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(P(c0)â‹‚ c1), s0[Ref]c2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: crefdf
blocks.content: A formulation of ~ crefi easier to use for definitions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm crefdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2))), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c1, ccref(c4))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2))), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c4), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)))
  syl3an1b(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c4), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)), wcel(c0, ccref(c4)))
  eleq2i(c0, c1, ccref(c4))
  crefi(s0, c0, c4, c2, c3)
  reximi2(s0, cin(cpw(c0), c4), cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2), wa(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), c4)), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wa(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w0), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), c4)), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w0))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4)))
  elin(cv(s0), cpw(c0), c4)
  anim2i(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0)
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w0, wbr(cv(s0), cref, c2))
